channel.title: 508 Help
channel.description: Ive been trying to send out my 508 client thinking that it is all done 100% ready to go Ive followed the " TUTS " On Mopar and i seem to be doing something wrong. When the User downloads the Client and Runs it the client remains loading knowing that now means it can not connect even tho Ive changed both the source and client ip to match if you have any suggestions on what i can do to help my situation i would be grateful and Rep++ if it works :)

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @montrealboi montrealboi
item.description:
@montrealboi wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:2, topic:387954”]Check these too:
-Is your firewall enabled?
-Did you portforward?
-Is your port open?
-Is your port same as client and server?
-Are you getting any errors when compiling?[/quote]

Firewall is good

Ive portforwarded

Canyouseeme.org says i’am open

They are both the same

I was but then i fixed it

But still i’am having the issue that i cannot get Players to connect to me

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Check these too:
-Is your firewall enabled?
-Did you portforward?
-Is your port open?
-Is your port same as client and server?
-Are you getting any errors when compiling?

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Help
item.dc:creator: @montrealboi montrealboi
item.description:
@montrealboi wrote:

Ive been trying to send out my 508 client thinking that it is all done 100% ready to go Ive followed the " TUTS " On Mopar and i seem to be doing something wrong. When the User downloads the Client and Runs it the client remains loading knowing that now means it can not connect even tho Ive changed both the source and client ip to match if you have any suggestions on what i can do to help my situation i would be grateful and Rep++ if it works
